page.title: 14MOAT HOUSE HOTEL,WIGLEY
page.content: The New Forest Moat House Hotel is situated at Wigley near the New Forest.It stands at the intersection of roads from Winchester and Salisbury to Bournemouth and Southampton.It was built in 1957 by extending the Vine Inn,with additional extensions in 1965 and 1971.Now it has 52 bedrooms with private bathrooms.There are two bars; one being the Vine bar,dating back to the 16th century,and a restaurant, candle_lit in the evenings,seating 150 guests.It overlooks the Motel gardens and a tree which may have been there in the original Domesday survey.Steaks and roast beef are the most popular items on the menu. With planning permission the manager would like to add sports facilities; a swimming pool,tennis courts and saunas,and a conference centre.
